Routed(uint256,bytes32).details: Event emitted when a message is relayed to another Safe Bridge.

params.epoch: The epoch of the batch requested to send.
params.ticketID: The unique identifier provided by the underlying canonical bridge.

params._amb: The address of the AMB contract on Ethereum.
params._bridge: The address of the arbitrum bridge contract on Ethereum.
params._veaOutboxArbToGnosis: The vea outbox on Gnosis Chain.

route(uint256,bytes32,(bytes32,address,u.details: Resolves any challenge of the optimistic claim for '_epoch'.

params.stateroot: The true batch merkle root for the epoch.

route(uint256,bytes32,(bytes32,address,u.notice: Note: Access restricted to arbitrum canonical bridge.

userdoc.notice: Router on Ethereum from Arbitrum to Gnosis Chain.
